snippet: Joseph A. Vitacco III was a child when he first heard the organ at Our Lady of Refuge in Brooklyn. It changed his life. Now he has brought life back to the organ.
abstract: Joseph A Vitacco III is mastermind behind rebuilding of pipe organ at his childhood church, Our Lady of Refuge Roman Catholic Church in Midwood, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Joseph A. Vitacco III was a child when he first heard the organ at Our Lady of Refuge in Brooklyn. It changed his life. Now he has brought life back to the organ.

headline.seo: Pipe Organ Is Restored at Our Lady of Refuge in Brooklyn
headline.main: From a Child’s Memory, the Sound of an Organ Is Brought Back to Life
headline.print_headline:
Notes From Childhood,
Restored in an Old Organ

keywords.value: Our Lady of Refuge Roman Catholic Church (Brooklyn, NY)
